game.name: Slam Dunk Mania
game.description:
Your desire to play as an active player in a NBA league is going to be really successful in this version of game that is really crazy some and outstanding for basket ball games online players. This basket ball game at the same time is a more about practicing of, effectively, throwing ball in the basket in a stipulated and assured time frame.

In the online basket arena, there are four balls and you have to throw that balls in the basket within the time span of ninety seconds. However, in the game you also have to too attentive towards the basket movement as well. For the initial 30 seconds basket remain static at a place and for next 30 seconds begins from here and there and for the last 30 seconds you get 3 point of each of the basket Slam Dunk Mania free sports game online.

The combo of the ball speed as well as mouse capacity is essential to make it as a successful basket in this online basketball game. Basket is not as difficult as it is appearing to be in this online game, click and hold to select a ball, then use the mouse to adjust the power and distance of your shot. Release to shoot the ball, scores, there are worth 2 points normally and 3 points in the last 20 seconds.
